subject: Re: [junit] Junit Test Cases
msgSnippet: Hi Robert, I know we are writing the test case in the test script itself. If they need the test case they can go and read the test script itself. But in my
messageBody:
Hi Robert,
I know we are writing the test case in the test script itself. If they need the test case they can go and read the test script itself. But in my project the business team needs seperate test case word document for each test case.The business team usually dont have technical knowledge much. so they require a test case word document which should be readable and understandable by anyone.

Please send me some sample test case if you have in the word document

Thanks
praveen

Robert Wenner <robert.wenner@...> wrote:
> Do you write seperate Test Case in a word document for Integration
> Testing ?.
Why would I want to do that?
Care to explain?

Robert
